name: Electrocoin Pay
author: Electrocoin d.o.o

sections.description:
This plugin allows users to easily accept cryptocurrency payments via Electrocoin Pay (PayCek) in their WooCommerce stores.

How it works:

  1. The seller sets up their Electrocoin Pay profile

  2. During checkout on WooCommerce, the buyer chooses “Cryptocurrency” as their payment option

  3. Upon clicking “Place order”, the buyer is redirected to the Electrocoin Pay payment interface

  4. In this interface, the buyer chooses their desired cryptocurrency and protocol, then sends the coins to the specified address

  5. Once the transaction is processed, the seller receives the payment in their preferred currency

Terms of use

Privacy policy

Configuration

  1. Navigate to the plugin settings.

  2. Activate the Electrocoin Pay module.

  3. Input your Electrocoin Pay profile code, which can be found in the Electrocoin Pay profile settings.

  4. Input your Electrocoin Pay profile secret key, also located in the Electrocoin Pay profile settings.
sections.installation:
1. Use WordPress’ Add New Plugin feature

  2. Find plugin “Electrocoin Pay”

  3. Press “Install Now”

  4. Press “Activate”
